subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
lead_paragraph: A cooperative subject in Nick Saban, plenty of input from his wife and the right designer went into the making of a nine-foot statue of Alabama’s football coach.
snippet: A cooperative subject in Nick Saban, plenty of input from his wife and the right designer went into the making of a nine-foot statue of Alabama’s football coach.
